verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> in the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was on me, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me on a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> by which was as the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H376>man,<s%> whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> that I shall <S%H7200>show<s%> you; for to the <S%H4616>intent<s%> that I might <S%H7200>show<s%> them to you are you <S%H935>brought<s%> here: <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H7200>see<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H2346>wall<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and in the man's <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> long by the <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an <S%H2948>hand<s%> <S%H2948>breadth:<s%> so he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1146>building,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and the <S%H6967>height,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> thereof, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the gate, which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And every little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> by the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> he the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>eastward<s%> <S%H6921><s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> <S%H6311>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H6311>side;<s%> they <S%H7969>three<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure:<s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> side and on that side.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H1366>space<s%> also <S%H6440>before<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on this side, and the <S%H1366>space<s%> was one <S%H520>cubit<s%> on that side: and the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> side, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on that side.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> then the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of one little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of another: the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> also <S%H352>posts<s%> of three <S%H7657>score<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> even to the <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2978>entrance<s%> to the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And there were <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> to the little <S%H8372>chambers,<s%> and to their <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> to the <S%H361>arches:<s%> and <S%H2474>windows<s%> were <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H6441>inward:<s%> and on each <S%H352>post<s%> were <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> there were <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and a <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were on the <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

And the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> was the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%> and <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

And the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> that <S%H6440>looked<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof were <S%H7969>three<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> side and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that side; and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And their <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and their arches, and their <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees, were after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6440>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and they <S%H5927>went<s%> up to it by <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps;<s%> and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

After that he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

And there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about, like <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2474>windows:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> to <S%H5930>go<s%> up to it, and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and it had <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees, <S%H259>one<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> side, and <S%H259>another<s%> on that side, on the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof.

And there was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof, according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about: it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>
And the <S%H361>arches<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about were <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees were on the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof: and the <S%H4608>going<s%> up to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof, were according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> therein and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about: it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees were on the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, on <S%H6311>this<s%> side, and on that side: and the <S%H4608>going<s%> up to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

The little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof, and the <S%H2474>windows<s%> to it <S%H5439>round<s%> about: the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees were on the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, on <S%H6311>this<s%> side, and on that side: and the <S%H4608>going<s%> up to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and the <S%H6607>entries<s%> thereof were by the <S%H352>posts<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> they <S%H1740>washed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And in the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on <S%H6311>this<s%> side, and two <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that side, to <S%H7819>slay<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering and the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering.

And <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> as one <S%H5927>goes<s%> up to the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables;<s%> and <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3802>side,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was at the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables.<s%>

<S%H702>Four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> were on <S%H6311>this<s%> <S%H3802>side,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that <S%H3802>side,<s%> by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7979>tables,<s%> <S%H413>whereupon<s%> they <S%H7819>slew<s%> their sacrifices.

And the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> were of <S%H1496>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, of a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H1363>high:<s%> <S%H413>whereupon<s%> also they <S%H3240>laid<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7819>slew<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>

And <S%H1004>within<s%> were <S%H8240>hooks,<s%> an <S%H2948>hand<s%> broad, <S%H3559>fastened<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: and on the <S%H7979>tables<s%> was the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H7133>offering.<s%>

And <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> were the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%> in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and their <S%H6440>prospect<s%> was <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> having the <S%H6440>prospect<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to me, <S%H2090>This<s%> <S%H3957>chamber,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> is for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
